thread.title: Style-icon Deepika Padukone reveals she isn't fashion forward
thread.title_full: Style-icon Deepika Padukone reveals she isn't fashion forward - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Style-icon Deepika Padukone reveals she isn't fashion forward
text: Mumbai, Sept 12 (ANI): Bollywood actress Deepika Padukone , who has been bagged in as the brand ambassador of Axis Bank, never fails to woo audience with her chic style presence on silver screen but the 'Piku' star admits that she is not fashion forward. Deepika will be seen next to Ranbir Kapoor in Imtiaz Ali's 'Tamasha' which is scheduled to release on November 27 and in Sanjay Leela Bansali's 'Bajirao Mastani' opposite Ranveer Singh, which is scheduled to release on December 18.
